text: Movie Days () is a 1994 Icelandic drama movie directed by Friðrik Þór Friðriksson and starring Örvar Jens Arnarson, Rúrik Haraldsson, Sigrún Hjálmtýsdóttir, Orri Helgason. == Other websites == * Category:1994 drama movies Category:Icelandic movies Category:Movies directed by Friðrik Þór Friðriksson
title: Movie Days
